chat.msg: Welcome!
hello there
Hi
what is my goal?
The goal is to reach some object on the map in a specific path
You should follow my orders to reach it
what are those dots?
The yellow dots show the path you traveled on the map
The purple dots are for you to navigate with your mouse device
ok got it im moving now, where to?
Cross the sea over the stick to the island on the left
to the leopard?
Go south west over the bridge
should i go to the leopard?
Yes
ok done
Nice, where are you now?
im near the this orange tiger
I'm not sure what you mean but maybe this will help
Pass the branch below the leopard, to the left
ok i have reached the parrot
Continue around the parrot until you are below the parrot, heading eastwards
now sure i understand how
Go around the parrot above it, then head to the gray rocks below the parrot
not sure i understand, do i go around it and between the elephant?
Continue around the parrot until you are below the parrot, heading eastwards
ok im next to the rocks
From the bottom of the parrot-elephant island (the crocodile's mouth) move to the bridge towards the giraffe island
should i go to the frog first?
Yes
oh ok
Mmm... just...
Proceed south east toward the frog
ok im near the this green toad
I meant
Head very closely to the frog and then turn back and head west to the crocodile
ok im heading west
I meant
From the rocks continue right and down to the center of the island
After that go west (back) and exit the island on the aligator
i passed the aligator, now near a big rock
Ok, where are you now?
near a big rock
From the big black rock of the crocodile move to the pair of gray rocks next to the giraffe
awsome i did that, im next to the giraph
Say bye bye to the giraffe and proceed carefully over the branch towards the snake
should i pass the gray rocks first?
I meant
There is a big rock next to the crocodile's head, step on it and continue left
ok so now im at the giraph
Go down from the giraffe
Cross the wooden stick to the snake
